themes: inclusion of legacy organizations in funding
key_phrases: Ensure that legacy organizations—those with over five years of proven impact and a strong track record in Austin—are actively included in the grant process
establishing a separate grant category specifically for long-standing organizations
contributed significantly to the cultural fabric of the city
must receive support to sustain their value amidst the rising costs of operations
barriers_identified: legacy organizations being overlooked or excluded from the grant process
rising costs of operations threatening sustainability
solutions_proposed: actively include legacy organizations in the grant process
establish a separate grant category for long-standing organizations
